column4: Hi, do you guys like KDE? I mean, does anyone have a reason why that would be needed?

because linux devs are smart and they have cameras as well
make sure he cleans out his sources too

too many nerim.net repos. You only need one (testing)

but my name can be either
because linux devs are smart and they have cameras as well
